# Upgrade Plan

## Overview
Upgrade Java project to latest LTS versions (Java 21 and Spring Boot 3.4).

## Tasks
See tasks.json for detailed task breakdown.

## Scope
- Upgrade JDK to version 21 (latest LTS)
- Upgrade Spring Boot to version 3.4
- Upgrade Spring Framework to 6.x
- Migrate javax.* packages to jakarta.* namespaces as required

## Success Criteria
- Project builds successfully
- All existing unit tests pass
